"Sculpted Ice Cubes" - An ice cube tray with unique shapes and designs that can be used to create sculpted ice cubes for cocktails, mocktails, and desserts. The ice cubes can be designed to resemble fruits, flowers, animals, or any other creative shape.

"Ice Cream Sandwich Maker" - An ice cream sandwich maker that allows users to make their own ice cream sandwiches at home. The ice cream sandwiches can be made with any type of ice cream and any type of cookie or cake.

"Ice Cube Tray with Built-In Blender" - An ice cube tray with a built-in blender that allows users to blend their own smoothies and cocktails right in the tray. The blender can be powered by a USB cable or a rechargeable battery.

"Multi-Purpose Ice Cube Tray" - An ice cube tray that can be used for multiple purposes, such as making ice cubes, popsicles, and frozen fruit skewers. The tray can also be used to make mini tacos, sliders, and other bite-sized snacks.

"Ice Cube Tray with LED Lights" - An ice cube tray with LED lights that can be used to create colorful and festive ice cubes. The lights can be customized to any color or pattern, and can be turned on and off with a remote control.
